title: Blambot Fonts Halloween Sale!
content:
Submitted by [paul d hunt](http://web.archive.org/web/20091030164602/http:/typophile.com/user/7006 "View user profile.") : 25.Oct.2007 3.09am 

BLAMBOT COMIC FONTS & LETTERING  
NEWS - October 2007 - Supplemental  
 [http://www.blambot.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20091030164602/http:/www.blambot.com/ "http://www.blambot.com")

Hey guys! Want 50% off your entire purchase of Pro Fonts?

Hidden somewhere on the Blambot website is an 8-digit coupon code good for 50% off your entire order of Pro Fonts! Once you find it, select the fonts you want to purchase, enter the code in the Coupon field and click Update Cart! Offer ends November 1st.

Trick or Treat!

~N
author: paul d hunt
